text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ――so that's why, please help us out！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
For all the trouble I've caused up until now, I'll apologize as 
many times as you'd like. But to ensure that the Cheer Squad this 
time is a success, I need your help！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Sure. The documents for last time's 
Cheer Squad are right here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……it's understandable that you'd say that. But King――…… 
E-eeeeeeh！？ You're okay with that！？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Hm？ Of course. Disciplinary Committee rule 56！ 
『If you're being asked for help, take action！』, that's why.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh. B-but, up until now, weren't you quite mad at King……？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
That's because of all the racket and questionable things you were doing！ 
But this is about getting some tips on cheering, right？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Then there's no reason that I shouldn't help you！ 
That's it！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ah……

text_block_list.name: King & Nature
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's dive right in then. King, in regards 
to the Fan Appreciation Festival, what do you think 
is important when it comes to cheering？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Um, well…… having a unified purpose. And to cheer 
on the Uma Musume participating in the events so they 
can display their full strength, I think.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Aah～～, that's important too. However！！ 
There's one more thing that's just as important！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
What you guys are doing is, being part of the Cheer Squad at the 
Appreciation Festival.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
――The Fan Appreciation Festival is an event where we can convey 
our gratitude to all the fans who always cheer us on.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
That's why at every event, our number one goal is to ensure the 
fans are having fun!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: It's the same with the Cheer Squad！！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
The Cheer Squad's goal is to have fun cheering with 
the fans！ At the same time as livening up the events, 
their role is to get the fans fired up！！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
By cheering, make sure they have fun！ 
The Cheer Squad is a way to convey our gratitude to the fans！！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
――normally we're clearly split in to the side doing the cheering 
and the side being cheered for, however―

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
During the Appreciation Festival, the Cheer Squad and fans stand 
in the same place as comrades！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Standing together with the fans as comrades……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Alright, everyone！ Make sure to liven this up as grandly and 
vociferously as possible！ For those of you gathered here, I'll 
grant you the privilege of basking in this King's aura！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
We can't yet. After all, we haven't even been able to liven 
things up at all……！ As the leader, I need to pull everyone up 
along with me, I just need to liven everything up……！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……perhaps I was getting a little ahead of myself. Rather than 
standing side-by-side, it's more that I've been standing in front 
and trying to pull them forward.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
In that case, you just need to be careful from here on！ 
Next week, you have the second practice session, right？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
King. As the Captain, it's your job to ensure that everyone at 
the Appreciation Festival is having fun cheering.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
With that loud voice during practice, I could hear 
you across the school grounds！ You can make it an 
Appreciation Festival to remember―― right？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……Yes！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
Eh? The cue card for the cheer？ When it comes to the squad 
members, I think we all have it memorized already……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes. But, the Cheer Squad isn't just us. I want the fans to be 
able to sing along too. ……Please！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
Aah, I see～. That's right, we've only ever taught the fans 
verbally. I understand！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Thanks. While we're at it, before the day of the 
Appreciation Festival, we'll have to hold a meeting 
to gather the opinions of the fans……

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
If there's going to be a meeting…… do you think we should prepare 
some drinks and stuff？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's true！ I should make arrangements……！ 
Oh……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Um…… can I leave the arrangements to you？ 
I'd like to request your assistance.

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text: ……！ Yeah, just leave it to me！

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text:
Looks like she's settled down a bit. Communication is important, 
after all. Nature, what kind of magic did you use？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Eh～？ Oh come on, senpai. You know I can't use magic, and I'm not 
one of those girls with their head in the clouds.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
It just seems that King, simply decided that she'd 
do her best having her voice reach others. ……so that 
everyone could smile and cheer together.
――And then on the day of the second practice meet.

text_block_list.name: Fans & Cheer Squad Members
text_block_list.text:
Go, Go, Let's Go！ 
Tr-a-ce-n！

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Haa～～, I'm looking forward to the real thing～！ It seems like 
everyone's voices were in synch this time too！

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, I finally memorized the call too！ 
Let's make sure the Uma Musume can hear our voices～！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(The second practice meet was completely different, our voices 
were one. The faces of everyone gathered here were bright, as if 
they had already succeeded――)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(And the Captain standing next to me, 
was also happily laughing with them)
